muntu: Ndi munanga muanetu wa balume wa mutekete
Ndi munanga muanetu wa bakaji wa mutekete

muntu: ndi ne disanka dia diakutuilangane nebe
udi mua kusungula kuenze anyi to
Mudimu wetu : kuenza mushindu onsu bua ne muntu yonsu, muaba onsu wikala ye, amanye mudi malu enda pa buloba ne aakula kupitshila ku muakulu.
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

muntu: Mudimu wetu: kulongolola ngumu ya pa boloba bijima ne kuyipesha bantu bonsu ne ku itua mushinga.
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

a: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment
